transport

 Calculates the diffusive portion of the constituent transport. It contains an explicit version of the diffusion operator and a general (involving all potential cases) diffusion operator as well, with a coefficient theta_stm for selecting the level of implicitness. (theta_stm=0.5 is Crank Nicolson.). The matrix is solved via a tri-diagonal solver. ! The algoritm looks like this:
subroutine explicit_diffusion_operator (explicit_diffuse_op, conc, area_lo, area_hi, disp_coef_lo, disp_coef_hi, ncell, nvar, time, dx, dt)
 Calculate the explicit diffusion operator for a moment in time. Explicit diffusion operator construction. This creates the diffusive fluxes sends them for modification for boundaries and then differences the fluxes to get the operator d/dx(Ad/dx).

Detailed Description

Module orchestrating the diffusion scheme. The main routine in the module is diffuse(). Explicit and implicit diffusion operators are included here.

Member Function/Subroutine Documentation

subroutine diffusion::construct_diffusion_matrix ( real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(out)  center_diag,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(out)  up_diag,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(out)  down_diag,
real(stm_real), dimension (ncell), intent(in)  area,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  area_lo,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  area_hi,

integer, intent(in)  ncell,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  time,
integer, intent(in)  nvar,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dx,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dt 
)

Construct the matrix for the diffusion solver without boundary condition modification or structure on interior of domain.

Parameters:
[in]ncellNumber of cells
[in]nvarNumber of variables
[out]down_diagValues of the coefficients below diagonal in matrix
[out]center_diagValues of the coefficients at the diagonal in matrix
[out]up_diagValues of the coefficients above the diagonal in matrix
[in]areaCell centered area at new time
[in]area_loLow side area at new time
[in]area_hiHigh side area at new time
[in]disp_coef_loLow side constituent dispersion coef. at new time
[in]disp_coef_hiHigh side constituent dispersion coef. at new time
[in]timeCurrent time
[in]theta_stmExplicitness coefficient; 0 is explicit, 0.5 Crank-Nicolson, 1 full implicit
[in]dxSpatial step
[in]dtTime step

subroutine diffusion::diffuse ( real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(out)  conc,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(in)  conc_prev,
real(stm_real), dimension (ncell), intent(in)  area,
real(stm_real), dimension (ncell), intent(in)  area_prev,
real(stm_real), dimension (ncell), intent(in)  area_lo,
real(stm_real), dimension (ncell), intent(in)  area_hi,
real(stm_real), dimension (ncell), intent(in)  area_lo_prev,
real(stm_real), dimension (ncell), intent(in)  area_hi_prev,
real(stm_real), dimension (ncell,nvar), intent(in)  disp_coef_lo,
real(stm_real), dimension (ncell,nvar), intent(in)  disp_coef_hi,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(in)  disp_coef_lo_prev,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(in)  disp_coef_hi_prev,
integer, intent(in)  ncell,
integer, intent(in)  nvar,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  time_new,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  theta_stm,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dt,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dx 
)

Calculates the diffusive portion of the constituent transport. It contains an explicit version of the diffusion operator and a general (involving all potential cases) diffusion operator as well, with a coefficient theta_stm for selecting the level of implicitness. (theta_stm=0.5 is Crank Nicolson.). The matrix is solved via a tri-diagonal solver. ! The algoritm looks like this:

  • This creates the diffusive fluxes sends them for modification for boundaries and then differences the fluxes to get the operator d/dx(Ad/dx).
    • Calculate interior and boundary fluxes
  • Construct right hand side with neumann boundary condition imposed
  • Construct diffusion coefficeint matrix with neumann boundary condition imposed
  • Solve the system
    Parameters:
    [in]ncellNumber of cells
    [in]nvarNumber of variables
    [out]concConcentration at new time
    [in]conc_prevConcentration at old time
    [in]areaCell-centered area at new time
    [in]area_prevCell-centered area at old time
    [in]area_loLow side area centered in time
    [in]area_hiHigh side area centered in time
    [in]area_lo_prevLow side area centered at old time
    [in]area_hi_prevHigh side area centered at old time
    [in]disp_coef_loLow side constituent dispersion coef. at new time
    [in]disp_coef_hiHigh side constituent dispersion coef. at new time
    [in]disp_coef_lo_prevLow side constituent dispersion coef. at old time
    [in]disp_coef_hi_prevHigh side constituent dispersion coef. at old time
    [in]time_newInstantaneous "new" time to which we are advancing
    [in]theta_stmExplicitness coefficient; 0 is explicit, 0.5 Crank-Nicolson, 1 full implicit
    [in]dtTime step
    [in]dxSpacial step
subroutine diffusion::diffusive_flux ( real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(out)  diffusive_flux_lo,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(out)  diffusive_flux_hi,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(in)  conc,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  area_lo,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  area_hi,

real(stm_real), intent(in)  time,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dx,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dt 
)

Estimates the diffusive flux for a moment in time.

[in]ncellNumber of cells
[in]nvarNumber of variables
[out]diffusive_flux_hiExplicit diffusive flux high side
[out]diffusive_flux_loExplicit diffusive flux low side

[in]disp_coef_hiHigh side constituent dispersion coef. at old time
[in]timeCurrent time

[in]dtTime step
subroutine diffusion::explicit_diffusion_operator ( real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(out)  explicit_diffuse_op,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(in)  conc,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  area_lo,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  area_hi,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  disp_coef_lo,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell), intent(in)  disp_coef_hi,
integer, intent(in)  ncell,
integer, intent(in)  nvar,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  time,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dx,
real(stm_real), intent(in)  dt 
)

Calculate the explicit diffusion operator for a moment in time. Explicit diffusion operator construction. This creates the diffusive fluxes sends them for modification for boundaries and then differences the fluxes to get the operator d/dx(Ad/dx).

Parameters:
[in]ncellNumber of cells
[in]nvarNumber of variables
[out]explicit_diffuse_opExplicit diffusion operator
[in]concConcentration at old time
[in]area_loLow side area at old time
[in]area_hiHigh side area at old time
[in]disp_coef_loLow side constituent dispersion coef. at old time
[in]disp_coef_hiHigh side constituent dispersion coef. at old time
[in]timeCurrent time
[in]dxSpacial step
[in]dtTime step
subroutine diffusion::solve ( real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(in)  center_diag,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(in)  up_diag,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(in)  down_diag,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(in)  right_hand_side,
real(stm_real), dimension(ncell,nvar), intent(out)  conc,
integer, intent(in)  ncell,
integer, intent(in)  nvar 
)

Solve the system of linear equations.

Parameters:
[in]ncellNumber of volumes
[in]nvarNumber of variables
[in]down_diagValues of the coefficients below diagonal in matrix
[in]center_diagValues of the coefficients at the diagonal in matrix
[in]up_diagValues of the coefficients above the diagonal in matrix
[in]right_hand_sideValues of the right hand side vector
[out]concValues of the computed solution
